text: SSV Bozen Loacker is a men's handball club from Bolzano, Italy, that plays in the Serie A. == Titles == *Serie A : ** Winners (5) : 2012, 2013, 2015, 2017, 2019 *Italian Cup : ** Winners (4) : 2012, 2013, 2015, 2019 == European history == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" !
